open file 
```{r}

library(ape)
tree_COI_b <- read.tree("C:/witteLab/Fasta_files/COI_complete.fasta.treefile")
plot(tree_COI_b)
```
put labels in a vector

```{r}
head(tree_COI_b)
COI_labelb <-read.FASTA("C:/witteLab/Fasta_files/COI_complete.fasta.treefile")
```



fix labels
```{r}
library(stringr)

fasta_names <- names(COI_b)

mapping_df <- data.frame(
  full_label = fasta_names
) %>%
  mutate(
    accession = word(full_label, 1),
    genus = word(full_label, 2),
    species = word(full_label, 3),
    genus_species = paste(genus, species)
  )
```

```{r}
plot()
```
